item.description:
A workshop to help improve you photography printing.

If you have trouble making your own prints or are considering purchasing a printer than this class is for you

This will be a lecture and discussion class from 1:30 to 4 (2.5 hours) that will cover the process and details of turning your digital files into prints. We will cover the steps in the workflow to print your own or to prepare for a commercial printer.

Topics included will be:

intro to color management
prepping your digital files
printer settings and controls
media and printer choices

  • Replace this text with the first item of your list
  • Replace this text with the next item
  • You can add more items by adding lines that start with a



Come prepared to take some notes and to learn some easy methods to control the results you can achieve with your digital photos.
item.name: PRINTING DIGITAL PHOTOGRAPHS
